item.description:
Planning session for Learn To Fly Day. Please contact Dawn at dawn.marinelli@nationalgrid.com or call 617-671-4248 if you have any updates on the tasks you've been working on or if you have any new ideas to bring to the table.

We will meet at FIT, Charley is nice enough to volunteer up the FCA for our meeting! Thank you Charley. 

Oh and a big THANK YOU  to all who are helping out with this event!!!! Much appreciated!!!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Learn To Fly Day Planning Meeting
